Enums.name: TerraformResourceProvisioningState
Enums.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

Enums.name: Origin

values.name: user
values.description: Indicates the operation is initiated by a user.

values.name: system
values.description: Indicates the operation is initiated by a system.

values.name: user,system
values.description: Indicates the operation is initiated by a user or system.

Enums.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

Enums.name: ActionType
Enums.description: Extensible enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

properties.name: targetProvider
properties.description: The target Azure Terraform Provider

properties.name: IsOutputFullPropertiesEnabled
properties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration? This probably needs manual modifications to make it valid

properties.name: IsMaskSensitiveEnabled
properties.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration

ExportQuery.name: ExportQueryTerraform
ExportQuery.description: Export parameter for resources queried by ARG (Azure Resource Graph)

properties.name: query
properties.description: The ARG where predicate. Note that you can combine multiple conditions in one `where` predicate, e.g. `resourceGroup =~ "my-rg" and type =~ "microsoft.network/virtualnetworks"`

properties.name: namePattern
properties.description: The name pattern of the Terraform resources

properties.name: IsRecursive
properties.description: Whether to recursively list child resources of the query result

properties.name: type
properties.description: The parameter type

properties.name: resourceIds
properties.description: The id of the resource to be exported

properties.name: resourceName
properties.description: The Terraform resource name. Only works when `resourceIds` contains only one item.

properties.name: resourceType
properties.description: The Terraform resource type. Only works when `resourceIds` contains only one item.

properties.name: namePattern
properties.description: The name pattern of the Terraform resources

properties.name: type
properties.description: The parameter type

ExportResourceGroup.name: ExportResourceGroupTerraform
ExportResourceGroup.description: Export parameter for a resource group

properties.name: resourceGroupName
properties.description: The name of the resource group to be exported

properties.name: namePattern
properties.description: The name pattern of the Terraform resources

properties.name: type
properties.description: The parameter type

Models.name: ErrorResponse
Models.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations.

properties.name: error
properties.description: The error object.

properties.name: code
properties.description: The error code.

properties.name: message
properties.description: The error message.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The error target.

properties.name: details
properties.description: The error details.

properties.name: additionalInfo
properties.description: The error additional info.

valueType.name: ErrorAdditionalInfo
valueType.description: The resource management error additional info.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The additional info type.

properties.name: info
properties.description: The additional info.

Models.name: TerraformOperationStatus
Models.description: The status of the LRO operation.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: RP-specific properties for the operationStatus resource, only appears when operation ended with Succeeded status

properties.name: configuration
properties.description: The Terraform configuration content

properties.name: SkippedResourceIds
properties.description: A list of Azure resources which are not exported to Terraform due to there is no corresponding resources in Terraform

properties.name: errors
properties.description: A list of errors derived during exporting each resource

properties.name: status
properties.description: The operation status

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the  operationStatus resource

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: Operation start time

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: Operation complete time

properties.name: percentComplete
properties.description: The progress made toward completing the operation

properties.name: error
properties.description: Errors that occurred if the operation ended with Canceled or Failed status

Models.name: OperationListResult
Models.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The Operation items on this page

valueType.name: Operation
valueType.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

properties.name: isDataAction
properties.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for Azure Resource Manager/control-plane operations.

properties.name: display
properties.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

type.name: OperationDisplay
type.description: Localized display information for and operation.

properties.name: provider
properties.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

properties.name: operation
properties.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

properties.name: description
properties.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

properties.name: actionType
properties.description: Extensible enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

properties.name: nextLink
properties.description: The link to the next page of items

Clients.Name: AzureTerraformClient
Clients.Description: The Azure Terraform management API provides a RESTful set of web services that used to manage your Azure Terraform resources.

Operations.Name: list
Operations.Description: List the operations for the provider

Parameters.Name: apiVersion
Parameters.Description: The API version to use for this operation.

Examples.name: Get a list of operations for a resource provider
Examples.description: Get a list of operations for a resource provider

description.value: Lists all of the available RP operations.
Exports the Terraform configuration used for the specified scope.

Operations.Name: ExportTerraform
Operations.Description: Exports the Terraform configuration of the specified resource(s).

Parameters.Name: apiVersion
Parameters.Description: The API version to use for this operation.

Parameters.Name: subscriptionId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

Parameters.Name: contentType
Parameters.Description: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

Headers.Name: retryAfter
Headers.Description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Headers.Name: azureAsyncOperation
Headers.Description: A link to the status monitor

Headers.Name: location
Headers.Description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.
